sentences.en: an atmosphere of hypocrisy and deceit
sentences.cn: 充满虚伪和欺骗的氛围

sentences.en: He was trustful and without deceit.
He would have no truck with deceit.
KJV Thou givest thy mouth to evil, and thy tongue frameth deceit.
sentences.cn: [新译]你使你的口乱说坏话, 使你的舌头编造谎言.

sentences.en: Most people enjoy reading about deceit and dishonesty in high places.
sentences.cn: 多数人喜欢阅读有关上层阶层中尔虞我诈的作品.

sentences.en: She got them to hand over all their money by a wicked deceit.
sentences.cn: 她用卑鄙的手段使他们把所有的钱移交给她.

sentences.en: Simeon and Levi are brothers; deceit and force are their secret designs.
sentences.cn: 西缅和利未是弟兄. 他们的刀剑是残忍的器具.

sentences.en: That deceit won't pass with me.
The trader was truthful and without deceit.
sentences.cn: 这位商人很可信,童叟无欺.

sentences.en: There must be an end to the boredom and deceit of present - day family life.
sentences.cn: 当今家庭生活中的那种无聊和虚伪应该结束了.

sentences.en: Use no hurtful deceit . Think and justly; if you speak, speak accordingly.
sentences.cn: 不要采取有害的欺诈行为.思想要正当无邪. 如果要说话, 就要说得恰当.

sentences.en: War has been waged against us by stealth and deceit and murder.
sentences.cn: 密谋、欺诈和谋杀已经把一场战争摆到了我们面前.

sentences.en: You use your mouth for evil and harness your tongue to deceit.
sentences.cn: 19你口任说恶言,你舌编造诡诈.

words.tran_cn: 欺骗的；欺诈的；谎言的；虚伪的

trans.tran_en: behaviour that is intended to make someone believe something that is not true
